atk-abh02a1:2: 154. Idāni tadanantare āyatanavibhaṅganiddese suttantabhājanīyaṁ tāva dassento dvādasāyatanāni cakkhāyatanaṁ rūpāyatanantiādimāha. Tattha pāḷimuttakena tāva nayena –
atk-abh02a1:5_0: Tattha visesato tāva cakkhatīti cakkhu; rūpaṁ assādeti, vibhāveti cāti attho. Rūpayatīti
atk-abh02a1:5_1: rūpaṁ; vaṇṇavikāraṁ āpajjamānaṁ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṁ pakāsetīti attho. Suṇātīti sotaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:5_2: Sappatīti saddo; udāhariyatīti attho. Ghāyatīti ghānaṁ. Gandhayatīti gandho; attano
atk-abh02a1:5_3: vatthuṁ sūcayatīti attho. Jīvitaṁ avhāyatīti jivhā. Rasanti taṁ sattāti raso; assādentīti
atk-abh02a1:5_4: attho. Kucchitānaṁ sāsavadhammānaṁ āyoti kāyo. Āyoti uppattideso. Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:5_5: Manatīti mano. Attano lakkhaṇaṁ dhārayantīti dhammā.
atk-abh02a1:6_0: Avisesato pana āyatanato, āyānaṁ tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatananti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:6_1: Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṁtaṁdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā
atk-abh02a1:6_2: kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭṭenti vāyamantīti vuttaṁ hoti. Te ca pana āyabhūte
atk-abh02a1:6_3: dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārentīti vuttaṁ hoti. Idañca anamatagge saṁsāre pavattaṁ
atk-abh02a1:6_4: atīva āyataṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ yāva na nivattati tāva nayanteva, pavattayantīti vuttaṁ
atk-abh02a1:6_5: hoti. Iti sabbepi me dhammā āyatanato āyānaṁ tananato āyatassa ca nayanato ‘āyatanaṁ
atk-abh02a1:7_1: kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanaṁ veditabbaṁ. Tathā hi loke ‘‘issarāyatanaṁ vāsudevāyatana’’ntiādīsu
atk-abh02a1:7_3: Sāsane pana ‘‘manorame āyatane sevanti naṁ vihaṅgamā’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 5.38) samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:8_0: Cakkhurūpādīsu cāpi te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo
atk-abh02a1:8_1: nesaṁ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṁ. Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā taṁ nissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti
atk-abh02a1:8_2: cakkhādayo nesaṁ ākaro. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṁ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṁ, tattha tattha vatthudvārārammaṇavasena
atk-abh02a1:8_3: samosaraṇato. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṁ sañjātideso; taṁ nissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva
atk-abh02a1:8_4: uppattito. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṁ kāraṇaṁ, tesaṁ abhāve abhāvatoti. Iti nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena,
atk-abh02a1:8_5: ākaraṭṭhena, samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena, sañjātidesaṭṭhena, kāraṇaṭṭhenāti imehi kāraṇehi
atk-abh02a1:8_6: ete dhammā ‘āyatanaṁ āyatana’nti vuccanti. Tasmā yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṁ
atk-abh02a1:8_7: āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṁ…pe… dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṁ tāvettha
atk-abh02a1:9: ‘Lakkhaṇato’ti cakkhādīnaṁ lakkhaṇatopettha viññātabbo vinicchayo. Tāni ca pana nesaṁ lakkhaṇāni heṭṭhā rūpakaṇḍaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a1:10_0: ‘Tāvatvato’ti tāvabhāvato. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – cakkhādayopi hi dhammā eva. Evaṁ sati
atk-abh02a1:10_1: dhammāyatanamicceva avatvā kasmā dvādasāyatanāni vuttānīti ce? Cha viññāṇakāyuppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato.
atk-abh02a1:10_2: Idha channaṁ viññāṇakāyānaṁ dvārabhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena ca vavatthānato ayameva
atk-abh02a1:10_3: tesaṁ bhedo hotīti dvādasa vuttāni. Cakkhuviññāṇavīthipariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa
atk-abh02a1:10_4: cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṁ, rūpāyatanameva cārammaṇaṁ . Tathā itarāni itaresaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:10_5: Chaṭṭhassa pana bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto manāyatanekadesova uppattidvāraṁ, asādhāraṇañca
atk-abh02a1:10_6: dhammāyatanaṁ ārammaṇanti . Iti channaṁ viññāṇakāyānaṁ uppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato
atk-abh02a1:11_0: ‘Kamato’ti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati. Ajjhattikesu
atk-abh02a1:11_1: hi āyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighavisayattā cakkhāyatanaṁ pākaṭanti paṭhamaṁ desitaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:11_3: bahūpakārattā ajjhattikesu cakkhāyatanasotāyatanāni paṭhamaṁ desitāni. Tato ghānāyatanādīni
atk-abh02a1:11_4: tīṇi. Pañcannampi gocaravisayattā ante manāyatanaṁ. Cakkhādīnaṁ pana gocarattā tassa
atk-abh02a1:11_5: tassa anantarāni bāhiresu rūpāyatanādīni. Apica viññāṇuppattikāraṇavavatthānatopi
atk-abh02a1:11_6: ayameva tesaṁ kamo veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ…pe…
atk-abh02a1:11_7: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa’’nti (ma. ni. 3.421) evaṁ ‘kamato’pettha
atk-abh02a1:12: ‘Saṅkhepavitthārā’ti saṅkhepato hi manāyatanassa ceva dhammāyatanekadesassa ca nāmena, tadavasesānañca āyatanānaṁ rūpena saṅgahitattā dvādasāpi āyatanāni nāmarūpamattameva honti.
atk-abh02a1:13_0: Vitthārato pana ajjhattikesu tāva cakkhāyatanaṁ jātivasena cakkhupasādamattameva,
atk-abh02a1:13_1: paccayagatinikāyapuggalabhedato pana anantappabhedaṁ. Tathā sotāyatanādīni cattāri.
atk-abh02a1:13_3: pana anantappabhedaṁ. Rūpagandharasāyatanāni samuṭṭhānabhedato catuppabhedāni, saddāyatanaṁ
atk-abh02a1:13_4: dvippabhedaṁ. Sabhāgavisabhāgabhedato pana sabbānipi anantappabhedāni. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ
atk-abh02a1:14_0: ‘Daṭṭhabbato’ti ettha pana sabbānevetāni āyatanāni anāgamanato aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-abh02a1:14_1: Na hi tāni pubbe udayā kutoci āgacchanti, nāpi uddhaṁ vayā kuhiñci gacchanti; atha
atk-abh02a1:14_2: kho pubbe udayā appaṭiladdhasabhāvāni, uddhaṁ vayā paribhinnasabhāvāni, pubbantāparantavemajjhe
atk-abh02a1:14_3: paccayāyattavuttitāya avasāni pavattanti. Tasmā anāgamanato aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-abh02a1:14_4: Tathā nirīhato abyāpārato ca. Na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṁ evaṁ hoti – ‘aho vata amhākaṁ
atk-abh02a1:14_5: sāmaggiyā viññāṇaṁ nāma uppajjeyyā’ti, na ca tāni viññāṇuppādanatthaṁ dvārabhāvena
atk-abh02a1:14_6: vatthubhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena vā īhanti, na byāpāramāpajjanti; atha kho dhammatāvesā
atk-abh02a1:14_7: yaṁ cakkhurūpādīnaṁ sāmaggiyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇādīni sambhavanti. Tasmā nirīhato abyāpārato
atk-abh02a1:14_8: ca daṭṭhabbāni. Apica ajjhattikāni suññagāmo viya daṭṭhabbāni dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitattā,
atk-abh02a1:14_9: bāhirāni gāmaghātakacorā viya ajjhattikānaṁ abhighātakattā. Vuttañhetaṁ – ‘‘cakkhu,
atk-abh02a1:14_10: bhikkhave, haññati manāpāmanāpehi rūpehīti vitthāro. Apica ajjhattikāni cha pāṇakā
atk-abh02a1:14_11: viya daṭṭhabbāni, bāhirāni tesaṁ gocarā viyāti. Evampettha ‘daṭṭhabbato’ viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh02a1:15_0: Idāni tesaṁ vipassitabbākāraṁ dassetuṁ cakkhuṁ aniccantiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha cakkhu
atk-abh02a1:15_1: tāva hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccanti veditabbaṁ. Aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi aniccaṁ –
atk-abh02a1:16_0: Tadeva paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhaṁ. Yasmā vā etaṁ uppannaṁ ṭhitiṁ pāpuṇāti, ṭhitiyaṁ
atk-abh02a1:16_1: jarāya kilamati, jaraṁ patvā avassaṁ bhijjati; tasmā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanato, dukkhamato,
atk-abh02a1:16_2: dukkhavatthuto, sukhapaṭikkhepatoti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:17_0: Avasavattanaṭṭhena pana anattā. Yasmā vā etaṁ uppannaṁ ṭhitiṁ mā pāpuṇātu, ṭhānappattaṁ
atk-abh02a1:17_1: mā jiratu, jarappataṁ mā bhijjatūti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu kassaci vasavattibhāvo natthi,
atk-abh02a1:17_2: suññaṁ tena vasavattanākārena; tasmā suññato, assāmikato, akāmakāriyato, attapaṭikkhepatoti
atk-abh02a1:18_1: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ. Idaṁ aniccavevacanameva. Rūpā aniccātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Apicettha
atk-abh02a1:18_2: ṭhapetvā cakkhuṁ tebhūmakadhammā aniccā, no cakkhu. Cakkhu pana cakkhu ceva aniccañca.
atk-abh02a1:18_3: Tathā sesadhammā dukkhā, no cakkhu. Cakkhu pana cakkhu ceva dukkhañca. Sesadhammā
atk-abh02a1:18_4: anattā, no cakkhu. Cakkhu pana cakkhu ceva anattā cāti. Rūpādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a1:19_0: Imasmiṁ pana suttantabhājanīye tathāgatena kiṁ dassitanti? Dvādasannaṁ āyatanānaṁ
atk-abh02a1:19_1: anattalakkhaṇaṁ. Sammāsambuddho hi anattalakkhaṇaṁ dassento aniccena vā dasseti,
atk-abh02a1:19_2: dukkhena vā, aniccadukkhehi vā. Tattha ‘‘cakkhu, attāti yo vadeyya, taṁ na upapajjati.
atk-abh02a1:19_3: Cakkhussa uppādopi vayopi paññāyati. Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati ‘attā
atk-abh02a1:19_4: me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti. Tasmā taṁ na upapajjati – cakkhu
atk-abh02a1:19_5: attāti yo vadeyya iti cakkhu anattā’’ti (ma. ni. 3.422). Imasmiṁ sutte aniccena anattalakkhaṇaṁ
atk-abh02a1:19_6: dassesi. ‘‘Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, anattā. Rūpañca hidaṁ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, na
atk-abh02a1:19_7: yidaṁ rūpaṁ ābādhāya saṁvatteyya; labbhetha ca rūpe – evaṁ me rūpaṁ hotu, evaṁ me
atk-abh02a1:19_8: rūpaṁ mā ahosīti. Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ anattā tasmā rūpaṁ ābādhāya saṁvattati;
atk-abh02a1:19_9: na ca labbhati rūpe – evaṁ me rūpaṁ hotu, evaṁ me rūpaṁ mā ahosī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 3.59;
atk-abh02a1:19_10: mahāva. 20) imasmiṁ sutte dukkhena anattalakkhaṇaṁ dassesi. ‘‘Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ,
atk-abh02a1:19_11: yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ dukkhaṁ tadanattā, yadanattā taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi,
atk-abh02a1:19_12: na meso attā’’tiādīsu (saṁ. ni. 3.15) aniccadukkhehi anattalakkhaṇaṁ dassesi. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a1:20_0: Hatthato hi taṭṭake vā sarake vā kismiñcideva vā patitvā bhinne ‘aho anicca’nti vadanti.
atk-abh02a1:20_1: Evaṁ aniccaṁ pākaṭaṁ nāma. Attabhāvasmiṁ pana gaṇḍapiḷakādīsu vā uṭṭhitāsu khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi
atk-abh02a1:20_2: vā viddhāsu ‘aho dukkha’nti vadanti. Evaṁ dukkhaṁ pākaṭaṁ nāma. Anattalakkhaṇaṁ apākaṭaṁ
atk-abh02a1:20_3: andhakāraṁ avibhūtaṁ duppaṭivijjhaṁ duddīpanaṁ duppaññāpanaṁ . Aniccadukkhalakkhaṇāni
atk-abh02a1:20_4: uppādā vā tathāgatānaṁ anuppādā vā paññāyanti. Anattalakkhaṇaṁ vinā buddhuppādā na
atk-abh02a1:20_5: paññāyati, buddhuppādeyeva paññāyati. Mahiddhikā hi mahānubhāvā tāpasaparibbājakā
atk-abh02a1:20_6: sarabhaṅgasatthārādayopi ‘aniccaṁ dukkha’nti vattuṁ sakkonti, ‘anattā’ti vattuṁ na
atk-abh02a1:20_7: sakkonti. Sace hi te sampattaparisāya anattāti vattuṁ sakkuṇeyyuṁ, sampattaparisāya
atk-abh02a1:20_8: maggaphalapaṭivedho bhaveyya. Anattalakkhaṇapaññāpanañhi aññassa kassaci avisayo,
atk-abh02a1:20_9: sabbaññubuddhānameva visayo. Evametaṁ anattalakkhaṇaṁ apākaṭaṁ. Tasmā satthā anattalakkhaṇaṁ
atk-abh02a1:20_10: dassento aniccena vā dassesi, dukkhena vā, aniccadukkhehi vā. Idha pana taṁ aniccadukkhehi
atk-abh02a1:21_0: Imāni pana lakkhaṇāni kissa amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, kena paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhahanti?
atk-abh02a1:21_1: Aniccalakkhaṇaṁ tāva udayabbayānaṁ amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, santatiyā paṭicchannattā,
atk-abh02a1:21_2: na upaṭṭhāti. Dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, iriyāpathehi
atk-abh02a1:21_3: paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhāti. Anattalakkhaṇaṁ nānādhātuvinibbhogassa amanasikārā
atk-abh02a1:21_4: appaṭivedhā, ghanena paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhāti. Udayabbayaṁ pana pariggahetvā
atk-abh02a1:21_5: santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṁ
atk-abh02a1:21_6: manasikatvā iriyāpathe ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Nānādhātuyo
atk-abh02a1:21_7: vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhoge kate anattalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a1:22_0: Ettha ca aniccaṁ aniccalakkhaṇaṁ, dukkhaṁ dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ, anattā anattalakkhaṇanti
atk-abh02a1:22_1: ayaṁ vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha aniccanti khandhapañcakaṁ. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvā,
atk-abh02a1:22_2: hutvā abhāvato vā; uppādavayaññathattaṁ aniccalakkhaṇaṁ, hutvā abhāvasaṅkhāto ākāravikāro
atk-abh02a1:22_3: vā. ‘‘Yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha’’nti vacanato pana tadeva khandhapañcakaṁ dukkhaṁ. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a1:22_5: anattā’’ti pana vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṁ anattā. Kasmā? Avasavattanato; avasavattanākāro
atk-abh02a1:22_6: anattalakkhaṇaṁ. Iti aññadeva aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ anattā, aññāni aniccadukkhānattalakkhaṇāni.
atk-abh02a1:22_7: Pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyoti idañhi sabbampi aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ
atk-abh02a1:23: Saṅkhepato panettha dasāyatanāni kāmāvacarāni, dve tebhūmakāni. Sabbesupi sammasanacāro kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a1:26_1: rūpāyatana’’nti yugalato āyatanāni vuttāni, tathā avatvā ajjhattikabāhirānaṁ sabbākārato
atk-abh02a1:27: 156. Tesaṁ niddesavāre tattha katamaṁ cakkhāyatanantiādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a1:28_0: 167. Yaṁ panetaṁ dhammāyatananiddese ‘‘tattha katamā asaṅkhatā dhātu? Rāgakkhayo
atk-abh02a1:28_1: dosakkhayo mohakkhayo’’ti vuttaṁ, tatrāyamattho – asaṅkhatā dhātūti asaṅkhatasabhāvaṁ
atk-abh02a1:28_2: nibbānaṁ. Yasmā panetaṁ āgamma rāgādayo khīyanti, tasmā rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti
atk-abh02a1:29_0: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha – ‘pāṭiyekkaṁ nibbānaṁ nāma natthi, kilesakkhayova nibbāna’nti.
atk-abh02a1:29_1: ‘Suttaṁ āharā’ti ca vutte ‘‘nibbānaṁ nibbānanti kho, āvuso sāriputta, vuccati; katamaṁ
atk-abh02a1:29_2: nu kho, āvuso, nibbānanti? Yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo – idaṁ
atk-abh02a1:29_3: vuccati nibbāna’’nti etaṁ jambukhādakasuttaṁ āharitvā ‘iminā suttena veditabbaṁ pāṭiyekkaṁ
atk-abh02a1:29_4: nibbānaṁ nāma natthi, kilesakkhayova nibbāna’nti āha. So vattabbo – ‘kiṁ pana yathā
atk-abh02a1:29_5: cetaṁ suttaṁ tathā attho’ti? Addhā vakkhati – ‘āma , natthi suttato muñcitvā attho’ti.
atk-abh02a1:29_6: Tato vattabbo – ‘idaṁ tāva te suttaṁ ābhataṁ; anantarasuttaṁ āharā’ti. Anantarasuttaṁ
atk-abh02a1:29_7: nāma – ‘‘arahattaṁ arahattanti, āvuso sāriputta, vuccati; katamaṁ nu kho, āvuso,
atk-abh02a1:29_8: arahattanti? Yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo – idaṁ vuccati arahatta’’nti
atk-abh02a1:30_0: Imasmiṁ pana naṁ ābhate āhaṁsu – ‘nibbānaṁ nāma dhammāyatanapariyāpanno dhammo, arahattaṁ
atk-abh02a1:30_1: cattāro khandhā. Nibbānaṁ sacchikatvā viharanto dhammasenāpati nibbānaṁ pucchitopi
atk-abh02a1:30_2: arahattaṁ pucchitopi kilesakkhayameva āha. Kiṁ pana nibbānañca arahattañca ekaṁ udāhu
atk-abh02a1:30_3: nāna’nti? ‘Ekaṁ vā hotu nānaṁ vā. Ko ettha tayā atibahuṁ cuṇṇīkaraṇaṁ karontena attho’?
atk-abh02a1:30_4: ‘Na tvaṁ ekaṁ nānaṁ jānāsīti. Nanu ñāte sādhu hotī’ti evaṁ punappunaṁ pucchito vañcetuṁ
atk-abh02a1:30_5: asakkonto āha – ‘rāgādīnaṁ khīṇante uppannattā arahattaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo’ti
atk-abh02a1:30_6: vuccatīti. Tato naṁ āhaṁsu – ‘mahākammaṁ te kataṁ. Lañjaṁ datvāpi taṁ vadāpento etadeva
atk-abh02a1:30_7: vadāpeyya. Yatheva ca te etaṁ vibhajitvā kathitaṁ, evaṁ idampi sallakkhehi – nibbānañhi
atk-abh02a1:30_8: āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuttaṁ. Tīṇipi
atk-abh02a1:31_0: Sace evaṁ vutte saññattiṁ gacchati iccetaṁ kusalaṁ; no ce, bahunibbānatāya kāretabbo.
atk-abh02a1:31_1: Kathaṁ? Evaṁ tāva pucchitabbo – ‘rāgakkhayo nāma rāgasseva khayo udāhu dosamohānampi?
atk-abh02a1:31_2: Dosakkhayo nāma dosasseva khayo udāhu rāgamohānampi? Mohakkhayo nāma mohasseva khayo
atk-abh02a1:31_3: udāhu rāgadosānampī’ti? Addhā vakkhati – ‘rāgakkhayo nāma rāgasseva khayo, dosakkhayo
atk-abh02a1:31_4: nāma dosasseva khayo, mohakkhayo nāma mohasseva khayo’ti.
atk-abh02a1:32_0: Tato vattabbo – ‘tava vāde rāgakkhayo ekaṁ nibbānaṁ hoti, dosakkhayo ekaṁ, mohakkhayo
atk-abh02a1:32_1: ekaṁ; tiṇṇaṁ akusalamūlānaṁ khaye tīṇi nibbānāni honti, catunnaṁ upādānānaṁ khaye
atk-abh02a1:32_2: cattāri, pañcannaṁ nīvaraṇānaṁ khaye pañca, channaṁ taṇhākāyānaṁ khaye cha, sattannaṁ
atk-abh02a1:32_3: anusayānaṁ khaye satta, aṭṭhannaṁ micchattānaṁ khaye aṭṭha, navannaṁ taṇhāmūlakadhammānaṁ
atk-abh02a1:32_4: khaye nava, dasannaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ khaye dasa, diyaḍḍhakilesasahassassa khaye pāṭiyekkaṁ
atk-abh02a1:32_5: pāṭiyekkaṁ nibbānanti bahūni nibbānāni honti. Natthi pana te nibbānānaṁ pamāṇanti.
atk-abh02a1:32_6: Evaṁ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo
atk-abh02a1:32_7: dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati. Tīṇipi hetāni nibbānasseva adhivacanānīti gaṇha’.
atk-abh02a1:33_0: Sace pana evaṁ vuttepi na sallakkheti, oḷārikatāya kāretabbo. Kathaṁ? ‘Andhabālā
atk-abh02a1:33_1: hi acchadīpimigamakkaṭādayopi kilesapariyuṭṭhitā vatthuṁ paṭisevanti. Atha nesaṁ
atk-abh02a1:33_2: paṭisevanapariyante kileso vūpasammati. Tava vāde acchadīpimigamakkaṭādayo nibbānappattā
atk-abh02a1:33_3: nāma honti. Oḷārikaṁ vata te nibbānaṁ thūlaṁ, kaṇṇehi piḷandhituṁ na sakkāti. Evaṁ
atk-abh02a1:33_4: pana aggahetvā nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo
atk-abh02a1:33_5: mohakkhayoti vuccati. Tīṇipi hetāni nibbānasseva adhivacanānīti gaṇha’.
atk-abh02a1:34_0: Sace pana evaṁ vuttepi na sallakkheti, gotrabhunāpi kāretabbo. Kathaṁ? Evaṁ tāva
atk-abh02a1:34_1: pucchitabbo – ‘tvaṁ gotrabhu nāma atthīti vadesī’ti? ‘Āma vadāmī’ti. ‘Gotrabhukkhaṇe
atk-abh02a1:34_2: kilesā khīṇā, khīyanti, khīyissantī’ti? Na khīṇā, na khīyanti; apica kho khīyissantīti.
atk-abh02a1:34_3: ‘Gotrabhu pana kiṁ ārammaṇaṁ karotī’ti? ‘Nibbānaṁ’. ‘Tava gotrabhukkhaṇe kilesā na
atk-abh02a1:34_4: khīṇā, na khīyanti; atha kho khīyissanti. Tvaṁ akhīṇesuyeva kilesesu kilesakkhayaṁ
atk-abh02a1:34_5: nibbānaṁ paññapesi, appahīnesu anusayesu anusayappahānaṁ nibbānaṁ paññapesi. Taṁ
atk-abh02a1:34_6: te na sameti. Evaṁ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṁ
atk-abh02a1:34_7: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati. Tīṇipi hetāni nibbānasseva adhivacanānīti gaṇha’.
atk-abh02a1:35_0: Sace pana evaṁ vuttepi na sallakkheti, maggena kāretabbo. Kathaṁ? Evaṁ tāva pucchitabbo
atk-abh02a1:35_1: – ‘tvaṁ maggaṁ nāma vadesī’ti? ‘Āma vademī’ti. ‘Maggakkhaṇe kilesā khīṇā, khīyanti,
atk-abh02a1:35_2: khiyissantī’ti? Jānamāno vakkhati – ‘khīṇāti vā khīyissantīti vā vattuṁ na vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a1:35_3: khīyantīti vattuṁ vaṭṭatī’ti. ‘Yadi evaṁ, maggassa kilesakkhayaṁ nibbānaṁ katamaṁ?
atk-abh02a1:35_4: Maggena khīyanakakilesā katame? Maggo katamaṁ kilesakkhayaṁ nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā
atk-abh02a1:35_5: katame kilese khepeti? Tasmā mā evaṁ gaṇha. Nibbānaṁ pana āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti
atk-abh02a1:35_6: ekameva nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati. Tīṇipi hetāni nibbānasseva adhivacanānī’ti.
atk-abh02a1:36_0: Evaṁ vutte evamāha – ‘tvaṁ āgamma āgammāti vadesī’ti? ‘Āma vademī’ti. ‘Āgamma nāmāti
atk-abh02a1:36_1: idaṁ te kuto laddha’nti? ‘Suttato laddha’nti . ‘Āhara sutta’nti. ‘‘Evaṁ avijjā ca
atk-abh02a1:36_2: taṇhā ca taṁ āgamma, tamhi khīṇā, tamhi bhaggā, na ca kiñci kadācī’’ti. Evaṁ vutte
atk-abh02a1:37: Idhāpi dasāyatanāni kāmāvacarāni, dve pana catubhūmakāni lokiyalokuttaramissakānīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a1:40_0: 168. Idhāpi pañhāpucchake yaṁ labbhati yañca na labbhati, taṁ sabbaṁ pucchitvā labbhamānavaseneva
atk-abh02a1:40_1: vissajjanaṁ vuttaṁ; na kevalañca idha, sabbesupi pañhāpucchakesu eseva nayo. Idha
atk-abh02a1:40_2: pana dasannaṁ āyatanānaṁ rūpabhāvena abyākatatā veditabbā. Dvinnaṁ āyatanānaṁ khandhavibhaṅge
atk-abh02a1:40_3: catunnaṁ khandhānaṁ viya kusalādibhāvo veditabbo. Kevalañhi cattāro khandhā sappaccayāva
atk-abh02a1:40_4: saṅkhatāva dhammāyatanaṁ pana ‘‘siyā appaccayaṁ, siyā asaṅkhata’’nti āgataṁ. Ārammaṇattikesu
atk-abh02a1:40_5: ca anārammaṇaṁ sukhumarūpasaṅkhātaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ na-vattabbakoṭṭhāsaṁ bhajati. Tañca
atk-abh02a1:40_6: kho anārammaṇattā na parittādibhāvena navattabbadhammārammaṇattāti ayamettha viseso.
atk-abh02a1:40_7: Sesaṁ tādisameva. Idhāpi hi cattāro khandhā viya dvāyatanā pañcapaṇṇāsa kāmāvacaradhamme
atk-abh02a1:40_8: ārabbha rajjantassa dussantassa muyhantassa saṁvarantassa sammasantassa paccavekkhantassa
